name: Flash Hangman Game
author: Petre Anghel

sections.description:
A cool flash hangman game for your blog.

Plugin created from Hangman.

To install, follow these stepss:

  1. Upload the “flash_hangman_game.php” file to your wordpress plugins directory (./wp-content/plugins)
  2. Login to the WordPress admin panel and activate the plugin “Flash Hangman Game”
  3. Create a new post or page and enter the tag [HANGMAN]

Have fun!
